-- | Fetch OpenSSH keys from a Github team
--   
@package openssh-github-keys
@version 0.1.0.0

module System.OpensshGithubKeys

-- | Returns a list of keys for the user, with the username appended for
--   easier identification.
formatKey :: MemberWithKey -> [String]
